All Classes

Class
Description
AutoEnchListener
Event listener responsible for automatically applying enchantment lore.
CustomEnch
Represents a custom enchantment handled by ZEnchantmentCore.
CustomEnchListener
Event listener responsible for sending events to custom enchantments for handling.
DefaultLoreHandler
The default LoreHandler that works on Spigot and its forks
EnchantmentCore
Main plugin class for ZEnchantmentCore.
EnchantmentGenerator
Represents a fully functional Minecraft enchantment generator.
EnchantmentHolder
Holder responsible for holding pending custom enchantments for registration.
EnchantmentInformation
Represents a unit of enchantment information that stores multiple enchantments and their associated levels and cost.
EnchantmentUtils
Utility class containing several useful methods for using the plugin, as well as manipulating and working with enchantments.
EnchEnums
Class containing various enums that ZEnchantmentCore uses.
EnchEnums.EnchConstants
Enum representing constant numbers for vanilla enchantments for use in the enchantment algorithm.
EnchEnums.ListenerType
Enum representing a type of listener supported by the custom enchantments.
EnchEnums.MaterialType
Enum representing groups of materials and their respective repair materials, if applicable.
EnchEnums.Rarity
Enum representing rarity of enchantments.
ItemEnchantListener
Event listener responsible for applying the custom enchantment generator to enchantment tables and anvils.
LegacyLootGenerateListener
Event listener responsible for generating loot tables for versions 1.14 and below.
LootGenerateListener
Event listener responsible for generating loot tables for versions 1.15 and above.
LoreHandler
The lore handler.
UpdateChecker
 
VersionUtils
Utility class on server version
